simple.title: Unvaccinated Bar Chart
simple.text:
This is a bar chart showing data for unvaccinated people.

Your turn: Hover over a bar to see the data for the corresponding week.

simple.title: Current Year Label
simple.text:
This is a bar chart showing data for vaccinated people.

Your turn: Once again, you can hover over a bar to see the data for the corresponding week.

That's it, have fun exploring the data!

simple.title: Current Selected Year

simple.title: Hover on Arc
simple.text:
You can adjust the filter either by resizing the selection (on the left or right) or by dragging the entire filter.

Your turn: Adjust the filter you have created.

simple.title: Click on Arc
simple.text:
You can adjust the filter either by resizing the selection (on the left or right) or by dragging the entire filter.

Your turn: Adjust the filter you have created.

simple.text:
